content: i created my grandpa s granny square on a trip to indiana this month to visit my amazing 95 year old grandpa he s a recently retired md jazz piano player avid golfer and all around amazingly brilliant and talented individual so grandpa i dedicate this square to you this square is specifically designed to be a companion square to my maryjane alien head and night owl granny squares the stitch counts are all the same and work great as a filler square to showcase these other more decorative blocks however it is beautiful as a stand alone square as well it s written as a solid one color square but it also looks great with color changes row-to-row or color changes on the front post stitches as well my finished square with worsted weight yarn and a 4mm hook comes out to just over 5 5x5 5 inches full video tutorial links come join my facebook group alternative crochet
